experience.description: ‚óè Worked on an NFT marketplace on Ethereum and a substrate-based parachain, enabling users to create, buy, and sell digital assets securely.‚óè Created and maintained a Node.js server to facilitate the migration of tokens from the Ethereum blockchain to a substrate-based chain, ensuring seamless interoperability and data integrity.

experience.title: Blockchain Developer
